casebody.data:
JEFFREY & CO.
v.
EVERETT. No. 497P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2007. E.C. Cradle, Pro Se, for Jeffrey & Company.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of September 2006 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2007."
